response.overview: Truck driver Jack Burton gets embroiled in a supernatural battle when his best friend Wang Chi's green-eyed fiancée is kidnapped by henchmen of the sorcerer Lo Pan, who must marry a girl with green eyes in order to return to the human realm.
response.tagline: Jack Burton's in for some serious trouble and you're in for some serious fun.
response.title: Big Trouble in Little China

titles.title: John Carpenter's Big Trouble in Little China
